channel.title: Snowflake connection error
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
I've just set up an AWS AMI (redash-8.0.0-b32245-1-eu-west-1) but I cannot create my connection to Snowflake DB. Getting a pretty generic error: ``` 002043 (02000): SQL compilation error: Object does not exist, or operation cannot be performed. ``` I have checked and double checked the values for each parameter, made sure that I can connect with the same credentials via the UI. I've even made a connection with those credentials with the Python snowflake connector. But I just can't seem to connect via Redash
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: 8 * Browser/OS: Chrome / MacOS 12.5.1 * How did you install Redash: AWS AMI

item.title: Snowflake connection error
item.dc:creator: mcpj
item.description:
Issue Summary

I’ve just set up an AWS AMI (redash-8.0.0-b32245-1-eu-west-1) but I cannot create my connection to Snowflake DB. Getting a pretty generic error:

002043 (02000): SQL compilation error: Object does not exist, or operation cannot be performed.

I have checked and double checked the values for each parameter, made sure that I can connect with the same credentials via the UI.
I’ve even made a connection with those credentials with the Python snowflake connector.
But I just can’t seem to connect via Redash

Technical details:

  • Redash Version: 8
  • Browser/OS: Chrome / MacOS 12.5.1
  • How did you install Redash: AWS AMI

Read full topic
